Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSImagingStudy

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSImagingStudy 0..*BaseImaging study model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
identifier 1..*IdentifierC.32.1 - Identifier
modality 0..*CodeableConceptC.32.2 - Modality
Binding Description: (preferred): DICOM CID029
subject 1..1Reference(Patient model | Device model)C.32.3 - Subject
encounter 0..1Reference(Encounter model)C.32.4 - Encounter
started 0..1dateTimeC.32.5 - Started
basedOn 0..*Reference(Service request model)C.32.6 - Based on
numberOfSeries 0..1unsignedIntC.32.7 - Number of series
numberOfInstances 0..1unsignedIntC.32.8 - Number of instances
description 0..1stringC.32.9 - Description
studyCustodian 0..1EHDSOrganizationC.32.10 - Study custodian
studyEndpoint 0..1EHDSEndpointC.32.11 - Study endpoint
series 0..*BaseC.32.12 - Series
seriesUid 1..1idC.32.12.1 - Series UID
number 0..1unsignedIntC.32.12.2 - Number
acquisitionModality 1..1CodeableConceptC.32.12.3 - Acquisition modality
Binding Description: (preferred): DICOM CID029
description 0..1stringC.32.12.4 - Description
numberOfInstances 0..1unsignedIntC.32.12.5 - Number of instances
seriesEndpoint 0..1EHDSEndpointC.32.12.6 - Series endpoint
bodySite 0..1CodeableConceptC.32.12.7 - Body site
Binding Description: (preferred): SNOMED CT
laterality 0..1CodeableConceptC.32.12.8 - Laterality
Binding Description: (preferred): SNOMED CT
specimen 0..*Reference(Specimen model)C.32.12.9 - Specimen
started 0..1dateTimeC.32.12.10 - Started
instancesInTheSeries 0..*BaseC.32.12.11 - Instances in the series
instanceTitle 0..1stringC.32.12.11.1 - Instance title
instanceUid 1..1idC.32.12.11.2 - Instance UID
sopClass 1..1uriC.32.12.11.3 - SOP class
instanceNumber 0..1unsignedIntC.32.12.11.4 - Instance number
radiationDoseInformation 0..1BaseC.32.12.11.5 - Radiation dose information
kap 0..1QuantityC.32.12.11.5.1 - KAP
totalKerma 0..1QuantityC.32.12.11.5.2 - Total Kerma
endTubeKerma 0..1QuantityC.32.12.11.5.3 - End tube Kerma
breastThickness 0..1QuantityC.32.12.11.5.4 - Breast thickness
abd 0..1QuantityC.32.12.11.5.5 - 2ABD
phase 0..1BaseC.32.13 - Phase
phaseCode 1..1CodeableConceptC.32.13.1 - Phase code
Binding Description: (preferred): SNOMED CT
radiationDose 0..1QuantityC.32.13.2 - Radiation dose

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSImagingStudy
title: Imaging study model
description: C.32 - EHDS refined base model for Imaging study

element.definition: C.32 - EHDS refined base model for Imaging study
Identifiers for the ImagingStudy such as DICOM Study Instance UID. If one or more series elements are present in the ImagingStudy, then there shall be one DICOM Study UID identifier.
All of the distinct values for series' modalities
Who or what is the subject of the study
Encounter with which this imaging study is associated
Date and time the study started.
A list of the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

Number of Series in the Study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

Number of  Service-Object Pairs (SOP) Instances in Study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.
The Imaging Manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the Study (component) performed.
Organization name, address, contact information.

An endpoint describes the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.
Each study has one or more series of instances
DICOM Series Instance UID for the series
Numeric identifier of this series
The modality used for this series
A short human readable summary of the series
Number of Series Related Instances

An endpoint describes the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.
Body part examined
Body part laterality
Specimen imaged
When the series started
A single SOP instance from the series
The description of the instance.
DICOM SOP Instance UID
DICOM class type
The number of this instance in the series
Kerma area product (KAP), Total KAP, Kerma at the end of tube (dental X-ray), Thickness of breast for the calculation of Average absorbed breast dose.
Kerma area product (KAP). A method of radiation dose monitoring used in radiographic and fluoroscopic studies.
Kerma is a measure of energy transferred from radiation to matter and is an acronym for kinetic energy released to matter.
Kerma at the end of tube
Thickness of breast for the calculation of Average absorbed breast dose.
Average absorbed breast dose.
Study phase, e.g., without contrast, arterial phase, venous phase, delayed phase. Only some types of studies have phases.
Study phase, e.g., without contrast, arterial phase, venous phase, delayed phase. Only some types of studies have phases.
Dose length product - Computerized Tomography (CT) related.
